item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-26
item.description: Adorable redesigned emoji—including Clippy—included in latest Windows 11 update (2 minute read) Microsoft will add redesigned emoji in the next Windows 11 update.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-23
item.description: Android Messages update handles Apple iMessage reactions properly (2 minute read) Google Messages on Android can now properly display emoji reactions sent from the iPhone’s Messages app.
